verses.verse: Then <S%H6030>answered<s%> <S%H464>Eliphaz<s%> the <S%H8489>Temanite,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%>
Should a <S%H2450>wise<s%> man <S%H6030>utter<s%> <S%H7307>vain<s%> <S%H1847>knowledge,<s%> and <S%H4390>fill<s%> his <S%H990>belly<s%> with the east <S%H6921>wind?<s%>
Should he <S%H3198>reason<s%> with <S%H3808>unprofitable<s%> <S%H5532><s%> <S%H1697>talk?<s%> or with <S%H4405>speeches<s%> wherewith he can do <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H3276>good?<s%>
Yea, <S%H637><s%> <S%H859>thou<s%> castest <S%H6565>off<s%> <S%H3374>fear,<s%> and <S%H1639>restrainest<s%> <S%H7881>prayer<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H410>God.<s%>
For <S%H3588><s%> thy <S%H6310>mouth<s%> <S%H502>uttereth<s%> thine <S%H5771>iniquity,<s%> and thou <S%H977>choosest<s%> the <S%H3956>tongue<s%> of the <S%H6175>crafty.<s%>
Thine own <S%H6310>mouth<s%> <S%H7561>condemneth<s%> thee, and <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H589>I:<s%> yea, thine own <S%H8193>lips<s%> <S%H6030>testify<s%> against thee.
Art thou the <S%H7223>first<s%> <S%H120>man<s%> that was <S%H3205>born?<s%> or wast thou <S%H2342>made<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H1389>hills?<s%>
Hast thou <S%H8085>heard<s%> the <S%H5475>secret<s%> of <S%H433>God?<s%> and dost thou <S%H1639>restrain<s%> <S%H2451>wisdom<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> thyself?
What <S%H4100><s%> <S%H3045>knowest<s%> thou, that we <S%H3045>know<s%> <S%H3808>not?<s%> what <S%H995>understandest<s%> thou, <S%H1931>which<s%> is <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H5973>in<s%> us?
With us are <S%H1571>both<s%> the <S%H7867>grayheaded<s%> <S%H1571>and<s%> very aged <S%H3453>men,<s%> much <S%H3524>elder<s%> <S%H3117><s%> than thy <S%H4480>father.<s%> <S%H1><s%>
Are the <S%H8575>consolations<s%> of <S%H410>God<s%> <S%H4592>small<s%> <S%H4480>with<s%> thee? is there any <S%H328>secret<s%> <S%H1697>thing<s%> <S%H5973>with<s%> thee?
Why <S%H4100><s%> doth thine <S%H3820>heart<s%> carry thee <S%H3947>away?<s%> and <S%H4100>what<s%> do thy <S%H5869>eyes<s%> wink <S%H7335>at,<s%>

That <S%H3588><s%> thou <S%H7725>turnest<s%> thy <S%H7307>spirit<s%> <S%H413>against<s%> <S%H410>God,<s%> and lettest such <S%H4405>words<s%> go <S%H3318>out<s%> of thy <S%H4480>mouth?<s%> <S%H6310><s%>

What <S%H4100><s%> is <S%H582>man,<s%> <S%H3588>that<s%> he should be <S%H2135>clean?<s%> and he which is <S%H3205>born<s%> of a <S%H802>woman,<s%> <S%H3588>that<s%> he should be <S%H6663>righteous?<s%>
Behold, <S%H2005><s%> he putteth no <S%H539>trust<s%> <S%H3808><s%> in his <S%H6918>saints;<s%> yea, the <S%H8064>heavens<s%> are <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H2141>clean<s%> in his <S%H5869>sight.<s%>
How much <S%H637>more<s%> <S%H3588><s%> <S%H8581>abominable<s%> and <S%H444>filthy<s%> is <S%H376>man,<s%> which <S%H8354>drinketh<s%> <S%H5766>iniquity<s%> like <S%H4325>water?<s%>
I will <S%H2331>show<s%> thee, <S%H8085>hear<s%> me; and <S%H2088>that<s%> which I have <S%H2372>seen<s%> I will <S%H5608>declare;<s%>
Which <S%H834><s%> <S%H2450>wise<s%> men have <S%H5046>told<s%> from their <S%H4480>fathers,<s%> <S%H1><s%> and have <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H3582>hid<s%> it:
Unto whom <S%H905>alone<s%> the <S%H776>earth<s%> was <S%H5414>given,<s%> and <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H2114>stranger<s%> <S%H5674>passed<s%> <S%H8432>among<s%> them.

The wicked <S%H7563>man<s%> travaileth with <S%H2342>pain<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> his <S%H3117>days,<s%> and the <S%H4557>number<s%> of <S%H8141>years<s%> is <S%H6845>hidden<s%> to the <S%H6184>oppressor.<s%>
A <S%H6343>dreadful<s%> <S%H6963>sound<s%> is in his <S%H241>ears:<s%> in <S%H7965>prosperity<s%> the <S%H7703>destroyer<s%> shall come <S%H935>upon<s%> him.

He <S%H539>believeth<s%> <S%H3808>not<s%> that he shall <S%H7725>return<s%> out <S%H4480>of<s%> <S%H2822>darkness,<s%> and <S%H1931>he<s%> is waited <S%H6822>for<s%> <S%H413>of<s%> the <S%H2719>sword.<s%>

He <S%H1931><s%> wandereth <S%H5074>abroad<s%> for <S%H3899>bread,<s%> saying, <S%H346>Where<s%> is it? he <S%H3045>knoweth<s%> <S%H3588>that<s%> the <S%H3117>day<s%> of <S%H2822>darkness<s%> is <S%H3559>ready<s%> at his <S%H3027>hand.<s%>
Trouble <S%H6862><s%> and <S%H4691>anguish<s%> shall make him <S%H1204>afraid;<s%> they shall prevail <S%H8630>against<s%> him, as a <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H6264>ready<s%> to the <S%H3593>battle.<s%>
For <S%H3588><s%> he stretcheth <S%H5186>out<s%> his <S%H3027>hand<s%> <S%H413>against<s%> <S%H410>God,<s%> and strengtheneth <S%H1396>himself<s%> <S%H413>against<s%> the <S%H7706>Almighty.<s%>
He <S%H7323>runneth<s%> <S%H413>upon<s%> him, even on his <S%H6677>neck,<s%> upon the <S%H5672>thick<s%> <S%H1354>bosses<s%> of his bucklers: <S%H4043><s%>
Because <S%H3588><s%> he <S%H3680>covereth<s%> his <S%H6440>face<s%> with his <S%H2459>fatness,<s%> and <S%H6213>maketh<s%> collops of <S%H6371>fat<s%> <S%H5921>on<s%> his <S%H3689>flanks.<s%>

And he dwelleth <S%H7931>in<s%> <S%H3582>desolate<s%> <S%H5892>cities,<s%> and in houses <S%H1004>which<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> man <S%H3427>inhabiteth,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> are <S%H6257>ready<s%> to become <S%H1530>heaps.<s%>

He shall <S%H3808>not<s%> be <S%H6238>rich,<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> shall his <S%H2428>substance<s%> <S%H6965>continue,<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> shall he <S%H5186>prolong<s%> the <S%H4512>perfection<s%> thereof upon the <S%H776>earth.<s%>

He shall <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H5493>depart<s%> out <S%H4480>of<s%> <S%H2822>darkness;<s%> the <S%H7957>flame<s%> shall dry <S%H3001>up<s%> his <S%H3127>branches,<s%> and by the <S%H7307>breath<s%> of his <S%H6310>mouth<s%> shall he go <S%H5493>away.<s%>
Let <S%H408>not<s%> him that is <S%H8582>deceived<s%> <S%H539>trust<s%> in <S%H7723>vanity:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> <S%H7723>vanity<s%> shall <S%H1961>be<s%> his <S%H8545>recompense.<s%>
It shall be <S%H4390>accomplished<s%> <S%H3808>before<s%> his <S%H3117>time,<s%> and his <S%H3712>branch<s%> shall <S%H3808>not<s%> be <S%H7488>green.<s%>
He shall shake <S%H2554>off<s%> his unripe <S%H1154>grape<s%> as the <S%H1612>vine,<s%> and shall cast <S%H7993>off<s%> his <S%H5328>flower<s%> as the <S%H2132>olive.<s%>

For <S%H3588><s%> the <S%H5712>congregation<s%> of <S%H2611>hypocrites<s%> shall be <S%H1565>desolate,<s%> and <S%H784>fire<s%> shall <S%H398>consume<s%> the <S%H168>tabernacles<s%> of <S%H7810>bribery.<s%>
They <S%H2029>conceive<s%> <S%H5999>mischief,<s%> and bring <S%H3205>forth<s%> <S%H205>vanity,<s%> and their <S%H990>belly<s%> <S%H3559>prepareth<s%> <S%H4820>deceit.<s%>
